CustomField.formula: IF ( ISPICKVAL(RFI_Item_Status__c , 'Requested') || ISPICKVAL(RFI_Item_Status__c , 'In Progress') || ISPICKVAL(RFI_Item_Status__c , 'Needs Detail'), IF(AND((Due_Date__c- TODAY() >= 0),(Due_Date__c - TODAY()<=2)), "Due in Two Days", IF(AND((Due_Date__c - TODAY()>2),(Due_Date__c - TODAY()<=7)), "Due in Week", IF((Due_Date__c - TODAY() < 0), "Overdue", "Due After A Week" ) ) ), "" )
CustomField.label: Due in Days
